EmailTemplate.subject: MAKS 2017 Cocktail Invitation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> MAKS 2017
COCKTAIL Please join us... Date July 17th, 2017
Time 19:00-21:00
Location Petroff Palace, Moscow, Leningradsky prospekt, 40
Dear Partner,
Begin your MAKS 2017 experience with Honeywell at a cocktail reception held at the Petroff Palace in Moscow. Senior leadership will be your hosts and will be there to answer any questions you might have on Honeywell's broad range of products and services.
Kindly RSVP to Irina Krianina at irina.krianina@honeywell.com <[[mailto:irina.krianina@honeywell.com]]>, mobile +7 495 795 0882.
Please note that the dress-code is business attire.
*Honeywell strives to abide by all laws of all countries where the company conducts business. As in some countries the law prohibits or restricts participation in representation activities, especially for government officials or employees of state-owned enterprises, we ask you to make sure that by accepting our invitation you do not violate local laws and regulations governing the receipt of gifts and / or participation in representation activities.
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[mailto:irina.krianina@honeywell.com]]>
